MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr affecting properties in Thorneyflat Drive and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a complex repair on an underground cable on Thorneyflat Drive and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.49pm on Tuesday 26th January 2021.
